snippet: Amy Trask, the Oakland Raiders’ longtime chief executive officer, has resigned, ending the tenure of one of the highest-ranking women in American professional sports.
abstract: Amy Trask, Oakland Raiders longtime chief executive officer, resigns, ending tenure of one of the highest-ranking women in American professional sports.
lead_paragraph: Amy Trask, the Oakland Raiders’ longtime chief executive officer, has resigned, ending the tenure of one of the highest-ranking women in American professional sports.
